entities.description: Reason for the last use of sedatives, including physical pain relief, feeling good, sleep aid, emotional relief, etc.
Main reason for the last use of sedatives, such as relieving tension, feeling good, or because of addiction.
Indicates whether the respondent misused sedatives in the past 12 months.
Indicates if the last misuse was with or without a prescription.
Indicates whether the respondent misused any Benzodiazepine sedatives in the past year.
The individual providing responses to the survey.

relationships.description: Relates the respondent to the reason for their last use of sedatives.
Defines the main reason for the respondent’s last use of sedatives.
Indicates whether the respondent misused sedatives in the past year.
Defines whether the last misuse occurred with or without a prescription.
Indicates whether the respondent misused Benzodiazepine sedatives in the past year.
